original_text: During 40 years you took care of them in the desert. Their clothes did not spoil. Their feet did not become big with pain.
korean_text: 사십 년 동안 들에서 기르시되 부족함이 없게 하시므로 그 옷이 해어지지 아니하였고 발이 부르트지 아니하였사오며

sentences.original_text: you took care of them in the desert
Their feet did not become big with pain
